summary: June 12 is the 163rd day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Ronald Lyle "Ron" Goldman  was an American waiter who was killed along with Nicole Brown Simpson in 1994 at her Brentwood, Los Angeles home, leading to the criminal investigation and arrest of former American NFL player turned actor O. J. Simpson. Simpson was acquitted of the murders, but was later found liable for Goldman's death in a civil trial.
title: Ronald Goldman
